JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities    Providing hands-on support on complex business solution and technology piloting projects   Ensure on-time launches by managing design, development, and integration efforts according to a standard or customized project plan.   Facilitate problem solving and collaboration across teams   Constantly review the code to ensure the quality of the design by avoiding complexity   Write clean, scalable code using .NET programming languages   Revise, update, refactor and debug code   Improve existing software   Develop documentation throughout the software development life cycle (SDLC)    Desired Candidate Profile    Experience in software development and coding in C#, Net, .Net Core, MVC, Angular 5,6,7,8,9   Proven experience as a .NET Developer or Angular Developer or Application Developer   Familiarity with the ASP.NET framework, SQL Server and design/architectural patterns (e.g. Model-View-Controller (MVC))   Knowledge of at least one of the .NET languages and HTML5/CSS3   Familiarity with Javascript and Angular JS 4   Experience with Databases MS SQL 2018   Experience with Entity Framework   Minimum 2 yr of experience for above requirement
